title: Red 1

fields.name: Choose one:
fields.value:
- Move 1 space forward. Not usable if it would move you past the ‚≠ê **Goal** space.
- Move backwards to the closest <:carpet_red:1256989173399818361> space. Must have one behind you.

desc: Can be played on top of <:carpet_red:1256989173399818361> or **1** cards.
